name: Paradox (itch) (MrHolmes)
description:
Move: Arrow Keys or WASD

Collect the time shards littered around the dungeon, one at a time, and deliver them to the shard container.

Avoid your past selves that will be collecting the shards you just delivered to the shard container.

Use your imagination

Music: bit bit loop - kevin Macleod - freepd.com
